actions.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 236 (Roll no. 38).

description: Amendment sought to restore protections to private student loan borrowers similar to those afforded other unsecured debtors by allowing the discharge of private student loans via bankruptcy.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-523 to restore protections to private student loan borrowers similar to those afforded other unsecured debtors by allowing the discharge of private student loans via bankruptcy.
